name: Mike MacDowel
introduction: Michael George Hartwell MacDowel (born 13 September 1932 and died 19 January 2016) was a British racing driver who raced in the 1957 French Grand Prix for the works Cooper team. He only raced 30 laps of the race, sharing his car with Jack Brabham, who had crashed on lap 4. The two drivers shared 7th place.
